page.title: 12Fox Ash Estate, Ardleigh
page.content:
Some smallholders have decided to join in the co-operative (Fox Ash Growers Ltd) and some to work privately. {Co-operative} {Private} A house and 5 acres House and land rented. bought and owned.
Only allowed to grow Can grow certain crops. anything.
Only top quality goods Everything is accepted and sold for sold whatever high prices. Others the quality thrown away. Large or quantity. quantities required Damaged goods for supermarkets. sold for lower prices.
Takes 3 days to get Goods sold crops to market. with 24 hours.
